name: Gloaming Comedian Simulator
description:
When the sun sets in Transylvania, the monsters come out to have fun. But they've never had a comedian quite like this before... Welcome to Gloaming Comedian Simulator, a quirky fusion of Casual, Arcade, and Visual Novel genres that's packed with laughs, frights, and fiendish fun.

You play as Barry Sazou, a down-on-his-luck comedian who unwittingly stumbles into the heart of Transylvania, only to find himself the unexpected guest of an assortment of bizarre and terrifying creatures. But Barry's got one thing in his favor: a razor-sharp wit and an arsenal of hilarious jokes that could bring any crowd - or creature - to its knees!

In this hilarious mash-up, your goal is to survive the weekend by roasting the ghastly inhabitants with the power of humor. Click on your feet as you survive a monster-filled castle, weaving a comedic narrative inspired by classical horror movies. Each creature you encounter demands a unique punchline, and the fate of Barry rests in your ability to deliver just the right zinger.

But don't drop the mic just yet - this three shows are merely the first act! This side-splitting journey is the first chapter of the Transylvania Tour. Each upcoming chapter, available soon as downloadable content (DLC), enriches the story with three additional shows.

Features:

  • Survive three life threatening gigs in the heart of Transylvania.
  • Engage with three unique monstrous characters, each with unique comedic weaknesses.
  • A multitude of hilarious punchlines and gags for you to discover and deliver.
  • Engaging storyline filled with tong in cheek laugh-out-loud moments.
  • Strategize and craft your routine before each show.
  • Unlock different comedian stances for each night.
  • Perfect your timing - click as fast as you can to deliver jokes that land.
  • Bring the house down with a rap finale.

Step into the spotlight and face the darkness with laughter in Gloaming Comedian Simulator. Are you ready to make 'em laugh till they drop? The stage is set, the mic is on, and the audience is deadly. Get ready to steal the show!
